sql-mapping.sql-content: select CD CODE_NO, CDTYPE CODE_CD, CDNAME CODE_NAME from cocode where highcd='$'||?
select CD CODE_NO, CDTYPE CODE_CD, CDNAME CODE_NAME from cocode where highcd=? and CDTYPE='SUB'
select CD CODE_NO, CDTYPE CODE_CD, CDNAME CODE_NAME from cocode where CDTYPE=? ORDER BY 1
SELECT SUBSTR(YPLANCD,1,4) AS CODE_NO, SUBSTR(YPLANCD,1,4) AS CODE_CD, SUBSTR(YPLANNAME,1,5) AS CODE_NAME FROM YEARPLAN ORDER BY 1 DESC --?

SELECT NVL(TO_CDNAME('PB',ORGCD),ORGCD) AS CODE_NO, NVL(TO_CDNAME('PB',ORGCD),ORGCD) AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,'3','-- ','(')|| ORGNAME|| DECODE(LEVEL,'2',')') AS CODE_NAME FROM ORGHISTORY A WHERE SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,4)||'0130' BETWEEN STARTDT AND ENDDT AND LEVEL BETWEEN '2' AND '3' START WITH ORG_NO='1051' CONNECT BY PRIOR TO_CHAR(ORG_NO)=HIGHORGCD

SELECT DISTINCT ORGCD AS CODE_NO, ORGCD AS CODE_CD, DYPLANNAME AS CODE_NAME FROM DETAILYEARPLAN A WHERE YPLANCD=? AND LEVEL =2 START WITH ORGCD =TO_ORGNOCD(TO_CDNAME_CD('PB',?)) CONNECT BY PRIOR ORGCD = HIGHORGCD
SELECT YPLANCD, YPLANNAME, ? AS TEMP FROM YEARPLAN ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT ORG_NO AS CODE_NO, ORG_NO AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,'3','-- ','(')|| TO_ORGNONAME_N(A.ORG_NO,?)|| DECODE(LEVEL,'2',')') AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM ORGHISTORY WHERE SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,6)||'30' BETWEEN STARTDT AND ENDDT) A WHERE LEVEL BETWEEN '2' AND '3' AND (ORGDIV IN ('D','T','B','') OR ORG_NO ='1369') START WITH ORG_NO='1051' CONNECT BY PRIOR TO_CHAR(ORG_NO)=HIGHORGCD

SELECT DECODE(LEVEL,'2','**')||ORG_NO AS CODE_NO, DECODE(LEVEL,'2','**')||ORG_NO AS CODE_CD, -- DECODE(LEVEL,'3','-- ','(')|| DECODE(LEVEL,'3','-- ','4',' ','(')|| TO_ORGNONAME_N(A.ORG_NO,?)|| DECODE(LEVEL,'2',')') AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM ORGHISTORY WHERE SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,6)||'30' BETWEEN STARTDT AND ENDDT) A WHERE LEVEL BETWEEN '2' AND '4' START WITH ORG_NO='1051' CONNECT BY PRIOR TO_CHAR(ORG_NO)=HIGHORGCD

SELECT ORGCD AS CODE_NO, ORGCD AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,'3','-- ','(')|| ORGNAME|| DECODE(LEVEL,'2',')') AS CODE_NAME FROM ORGHISTORY A WHERE SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,4)||'0130' BETWEEN STARTDT AND ENDDT AND LEVEL BETWEEN '2' AND '3' START WITH ORG_NO='1051' CONNECT BY PRIOR TO_CHAR(ORG_NO)=HIGHORGCD
SELECT CD CODE_NO, CDTYPE CODE_CD, CDNAME CODE_NAME FROM COCODE WHERE CDTYPE='SB' AND CD >= ? AND CD NOT IN ('EAA') ORDER BY 1
SELECT CD CODE_NO, CDTYPE CODE_CD, CDNAME CODE_NAME FROM COCODE WHERE CDTYPE IN ('SB','ST') --UNION --select '%' CODE_NO,'ST' CODE_CD,'전체' CODE_NAME from dual ORDER BY 1 --?
SELECT YEAR AS CODE_NO, YEAR AS CODE_CD, YEAR AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT YEAR FROM ESTIMATE) ORDER BY 1 desc --?
SELECT CD CODE_NO, CDTYPE CODE_CD, CDNAME CODE_NAME FROM COCODE WHERE CDTYPE=? ORDER BY CDDS
SELECT DISTINCT * from ( select bizregno CODE_NO, 'S_BIZREGNO' CODE_CD, bizregno CODE_NAME FROM bizacqcorp WHERE bizregno > ? ORDER BY bizregno )
SELECT CD CODE_NO, CDTYPE CODE_CD, CDNAME CODE_NAME, CDDS FROM COCODE WHERE CDTYPE='RDN_STS' AND CDDS >= (SELECT CDDS FROM COCODE WHERE CDTYPE='RDN_STS'AND CD = ?) ORDER BY CDDS
SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE = ? ORDER BY B.IDX,CODE_CD
SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE = ? AND B.CODE BETWEEN '105' AND '109' ORDER BY B.IDX,CODE_CD
SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE B WHERE B.HIGHCODE=? ORDER BY B.IDX,CODE_CD
SELECT SUBSTR(YPLANCD,1,4) AS CODE_NO, SUBSTR(YPLANCD,1,4) AS CODE_CD, YPLANNAME AS CODE_NAME FROM YEARPLAN ORDER BY 1 DESC --?
SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE B, COMCODE A WHERE A.CODE=? AND A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE ORDER BY B.IDX
SELECT YPLANCD, SUBSTR(YPLANCD,1,4) AS CODE_NO, SUBSTR(YPLANCD,1,4) AS CODE_CD, SUBSTR(YPLANNAME,1,5) AS CODE_NAME FROM YEARPLAN ORDER BY 1 DESC --?
SELECT CODE_NO as code_cd, CODE AS CODE_no, CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE WHERE HIGHCODE =? ORDER BY IDX,CODE_NO

SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE_NO IN ( SELECT SUBSTR(SDATA,ST,LEN) AS DATA FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS SN , A.*, DECODE(SN,1,ST_T-ST+1, TCNT,ST_0-1,LENGTH) AS LEN FROM ( SELECT SDATA, SN, INSTR(SDATA,',',-1,SN)+1 AS ST, INSTR(SDATA,',',1,1) AS ST_0, LENGTH(SDATA) AS ST_T, DECODE(SN,1,'',INSTR(SDATA,',',-1,SN-1) -INSTR(SDATA,',',-1,SN)-1) AS LENGTH, LENGTH(SDATA) - LENGTH( REPLACE(SDATA,',',''))+1 AS TCNT FROM (SELECT ? AS SDATA FROM DUAL) A, (SELECT ROWNUM AS SN FROM DAILYREPORT WHERE ROWNUM<101 ) WHERE SN <= LENGTH(SDATA) - LENGTH( REPLACE(SDATA,',',''))+1 ) A ) ) ORDER BY B.IDX

SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE = ? AND A.CODE_NO IN (SELECT CODE_NO FROM COMCODE START WITH CODE = 'ACD' CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_NO=HIGHCODE) ORDER BY B.CODE

SELECT CODE AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,2,' - ' ,3,' - ' ,4,' - ' ,5,' - ' ,6,' - ' ,7,' - ' ,8,' - ' ,9,' - ' ,10,' - ' )||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A START WITH A.HIGHCODE IN (SELECT CODE_NO FROM COMCODE WHERE CODE = ?) CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CODE_NO=A.HIGHCODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY IDX,CODE_CD

SELECT CODE AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,2,' - ' ,3,' - ' ,4,' - ' ,5,' - ' ,6,' - ' ,7,' - ' ,8,' - ' ,9,' - ' ,10,' - ' )||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A START WITH A.HIGHCODE IN ('100002726')--? CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CODE_NO=A.HIGHCODE

SELECT CODE AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,2,' - ' ,3,' - ' ,4,' - ' ,5,' - ' ,6,' - ' ,7,' - ' ,8,' - ' ,9,' - ' ,10,' - ' )||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A WHERE LEVEL=1 START WITH A.HIGHCODE IN (SELECT CODE_NO FROM COMCODE WHERE CODE LIKE ? START WITH CODE = 'PDL' CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_NO=HIGHCODE) CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CODE_NO=A.HIGHCODE

SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE_NO IN (SELECT CODE_NO FROM COMCODE WHERE CODE LIKE ? START WITH CODE = 'DOC_DIV' CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_NO=HIGHCODE) ORDER BY B.CODE

SELECT EMPID AS CODE_NO, TO_EMPGRADECD(EMPID)||EMPID AS CODE_CD, TO_EMPKNAME(EMPID) AS CODE_NAME
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT PERSONIC AS EMPID FROM CSR WHERE REQDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,6)||'01','YYYYMMDD') AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,6)||'01','YYYYMMDD'),1) AND (USER_GROUP =TO_USER_GP(?) OR PERSONIC IN (SELECT A.EMPID FROM EMPALL A , EMPALL B WHERE B.EMPID= ? AND B.SYSEMPID=A.SYSEMPID ))) ORDER BY 2
SELECT ROWNUM-1 AS CODE_NO, ROWNUM-1 AS CODE_CD, ROWNUM-1 AS CODE_NAME FROM ORG WHERE ROWNUM<7 --?

SELECT CODE AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,2,' - ' ,3,' - ' ,4,' - ' ,5,' - ' ,6,' - ' ,7,' - ' ,8,' - ' ,9,' - ' ,10,' - ' )||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A START WITH A.HIGHCODE IN (SELECT CODE_NO FROM COMCODE WHERE CODE LIKE 'MF_TYPE')--? CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CODE_NO=A.HIGHCODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY idx
SELECT MF_CD AS CODE_NO, MF_CD AS CODE_CD, MFNAME AS CODE_NAME FROM DPW_MF WHERE MF_TYPE = ?
SELECT MF_CD AS CODE_NO, MF_SPEC AS CODE_CD, SAIL_AMT AS CODE_NAME FROM DPW_MF WHERE MF_CD = ?
SELECT ID_CODE AS CODE_NO, ID_CODE AS CODE_CD, NM_CODE AS CODE_NAME FROM MASM.TBL_CODE T WHERE T.GR_CODE = 'CR'
SELECT ID_CODE AS CODE_NO, ID_CODE AS CODE_CD, NM_CODE AS CODE_NAME FROM MASM.TBL_CODE T WHERE T.GR_CODE = 'CA'
SELECT ID_CODE AS CODE_NO, ID_CODE AS CODE_CD, NM_CODE AS CODE_NAME FROM MASM.TBL_CODE T WHERE T.GR_CODE = 'CE'
SELECT ID_CODE AS CODE_NO, ID_CODE AS CODE_CD, NM_CODE AS CODE_NAME FROM MASM.TBL_CODE T WHERE T.GR_CODE = 'CF'

SELECT (SELECT SUBJ FROM CSR D WHERE D.DOCNO= E.CSR_SEQ) AS CODE_NO, (SELECT SUBJ FROM CSR D WHERE D.DOCNO= E.CSR_SEQ) AS CODE_CD, (SELECT SUBJ FROM CSR D WHERE D.DOCNO= E.CSR_SEQ) AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT MAX(P_TOT) AS P_TOT,SUBJ,MAX(DOCNO) AS CSR_SEQ FROM (SELECT DECODE(PERSONIC,?,300,0) + (COUNT(SEQ) OVER(PARTITION BY REPLACE(SUBJ,' ','')))*20+ ROUND(REQDATE-SYSDATE,0)*10 AS P_TOT, SUBJ, REGDATE, SEQ, DOCNO FROM (SELECT REGDATE, SEQ, REQUESTER, REPLACE(SUBJ,' ','') AS SUBJ, REQDATE, PERSONIC, STS, FINISHDATE, STARTDATE, EXPDATE, LASTACCESSDATE, LASTACCESSUSER, CONTENT, RESULT, PROCDATE, TEAM, CSR_TYPE, DOCNO FROM CSR WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-90,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+30,'YYYYMMDD') AND (USER_GROUP =TO_USER_GP(?) OR PERSONIC IN (SELECT A.EMPID FROM EMPALL A , EMPALL B WHERE B.EMPID= ? AND B.SYSEMPID=A.SYSEMPID )) ) A ) B GROUP BY SUBJ ORDER BY P_TOT DESC ) E WHERE ROWNUM<=30
INSERT INTO ED_LOG VALUES(GET_SEQ('FLOG','YYYYMMDD','000000'),[IP],'Login',SYSDATE,[EMPID])

SELECT DECODE(LEVEL,'2','**')||ORG_NO AS CODE_NO, DECODE(LEVEL,'2','**')||ORG_NO AS CODE_CD, DECODE(ORGDIV,'D','(','B',' -- ','T',' -- ','G',' ','')|| DECODE(LEVEL,1,' ', 2,' ',3,' ',4,' ',5,' ',6,' ')|| TO_ORGNONAME_N(A.ORG_NO,?)|| DECODE(LEVEL,'2',')') AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM ORGHISTORY WHERE SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,6)||'30' BETWEEN STARTDT AND ENDDT AND ORGDIV IN ('A','D','T','G','B') AND ORG_NO NOT IN ('1006')) A WHERE LEVEL >1 START WITH ORG_NO='1051' CONNECT BY PRIOR TO_CHAR(ORG_NO)=HIGHORGCD
SELECT (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL AS CODE_NO, (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL AS CODE_CD, (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL||'년' AS CODE_NAME FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 9
SELECT (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL AS CODE_NO, (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL AS CODE_CD, (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL||'년' AS CODE_NAME FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 9

SELECT DISTINCT MON, DECODE(MON, '', '', MON) AS CODE_NO, DECODE(MON, '', '', MON) AS CODE_CD, DECODE(MON, '', '', MON||'월') AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(YYMM, 5, 6) AS MON, YYMM, IMG_CODE FROM SABO_MNG WHERE IMG_CODE <> 'M') WHERE YYMM LIKE ?||'%'
SELECT (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL AS CODE_NO, (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL AS CODE_CD, (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))+1 - LEVEL||'년' AS CODE_NAME FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 10
SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(PMON), '00')) AS CODE_NO, PMON AS CODE_CD, PMON || '월' AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS PMON FROM COM_FILES WHERE ROWNUM<13)

SELECT CODE AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,2,' - ' ,3,' - ' ,4,' - ' ,5,' - ' ,6,' - ' ,7,' - ' ,8,' - ' ,9,' - ' ,10,' - ' )||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A WHERE LEVEL<5 START WITH A.HIGHCODE IN ('CD-20110415-001')--? CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CODE_NO=A.HIGHCODE
SELECT DISTINCT QM_BIZ AS CODE_NO ,QM_BIZ AS CODE_CD ,QM_BIZ AS CODE_NAME FROM QNOTE A,QMEMBER B WHERE A.QNOTE_NO =? AND A.QM_NO =B.QM_NO AND QM_BIZ != '인하대병원SM' ORDER BY CODE_NO
SELECT DISTINCT QM_BIZ AS CODE_NO ,QM_BIZ AS CODE_CD ,QM_BIZ AS CODE_NAME FROM QMEMBER B WHERE QM_BIZ != '인하대병원SM' ORDER BY CODE_NO --?

SELECT A.PRCSCD AS CODE_NO ,A.PRCSCD AS CODE_CD ,DECODE(LEVEL,2,' - ',3,' - ',4,' - ',5,' - ')||A.PRCSNAME AS CODE_NAME FROM PRCS A --WHERE A.PRCSTYPE = '*' START WITH PRCSCD = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR PRCSCD = PRCSTYPE ORDER SIBLINGS BY PRCSCD

select DOCNO AS CODE_NO, GET_CODENAME_N(DOCTYPE,'PDL') AS CODE_CD, GET_CODENAME_N(DOCTYPE,'PDL')||'-'||L_TITLE AS CODE_NAME from initpopup a, productdoc b where paramid =? and a.PARAM2 =b.DOCNO and A.param1=?
SELECT DISTINCT YM CODE_NO, YM CODE_CD, YM CODE_NAME FROM AVGLABORCOST order by code_no desc

SELECT EMPID AS CODE_NO, EMPID AS CODE_CD, NVL(TO_EMPKNAME(EMPID),EMPID) AS CODE_NAME, TO_EMPGRADECD(EMPID) AS GRADECD FROM PMS_PJTEMP WHERE PJTCD = ? AND REV_NO = ?
-- SELECT DISTINCT -- EMPID AS CODE_NO, -- EMPID AS CODE_CD, -- NVL(TO_EMPKNAME(EMPID),EMPID) AS CODE_NAME, -- TO_EMPGRADECD(EMPID) AS GRADECD -- FROM WBS_DIC -- WHERE LENGTH(EMPID)<18 -- START WITH (PJTCD = ? AND REV_NO=? AND HIGHWBS='R') -- CONNECT BY PRIOR PRCSNO =HIGHWBS -- ORDER BY GRADECD,CODE_NO

SELECT A.CODE||B.CODE CODE_NO,A.CODE||B.CODE CODE_CD, A.CODENAME||B.CODENAME CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM COMCODE WHERE HIGHCODE = 'CD-20110602-002' )A, ( SELECT * FROM COMCODE WHERE HIGHCODE = 'CD-20110602-001' ) B ORDER BY CODE_NO

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(S_YY||'0101','YYYYMMDD'),LEVEL -1),'YYYY') CODE_NO, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(S_YY||'0101','YYYYMMDD'),LEVEL -1),'YYYY') CODE_CD, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(S_YY||'0101','YYYYMMDD'),LEVEL -1),'YYYY') CODE_NAME FROM ( SELECT MIN(SUBSTR(STARTDT,1,4))S_YY, MAX(SUBSTR(ENDDT,1,4)) E_YY FROM PMS_PJTEMP WHERE PJTCD = ? AND REV_NO=? GROUP BY PJTCD, REV_NO ) CONNECT BY TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(S_YY||'0101','YYYYMMDD'),LEVEL -1),'YYYY') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E_YY||'1231','YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY') ORDER BY 1

SELECT CODE CODE_NO, CODE CODE_CD, CODENAME CODE_NAME FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LVL,C.* FROM COMCODE C --where code like '5%' START WITH CODE = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_NO = HIGHCODE ) C WHERE LVL=3 AND CODE NOT IN ('50270','50300')

SELECT CODE_NO AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(GET_TREEIMG(LEVEL-1), '',' '), '',' '), '',''), '','- '), '','')||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE B WHERE LEVEL >1 START WITH CODE = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_NO =HIGHCODE

SELECT CODE AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(GET_TREEIMG(LEVEL-1), '',' '), '',' '), '',''), '','- '), '','')||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE B WHERE LEVEL >1 START WITH CODE = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_NO =HIGHCODE

SELECT CODE||'/'||TRIM(TO_CHAR(S_RATE,'90.0'))||'/'||TRIM(TO_CHAR(A_RATE,'90.0')) AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEV,2,' - ' ,3,' - ' )||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME, TRIM(TO_CHAR(S_RATE,'90.0'))||'/'||TRIM(TO_CHAR(A_RATE,'90.0')) AS RATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SN, LEVEL AS LEV, SPLIT(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH((CODENAME),'§'),2,50),LEVEL) CODENAME, SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH((CODE),'-'),2,50) AS CODE FROM COMCODE A START WITH HIGHCODE IN GET_COMCODE('PMS_ICDB') CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_NO=HIGHCODE) A, IC_DTB B WHERE A.CODE=B.BIZ_TYPE(+) AND B.YM(+)= ? AND DECODE('2011','undefined','','2011') IS NOT NULL --조건이 없을때 조회 없음 --AND SUBSTR(CODE,0, 1) <> 'G' ORDER BY SN
SELECT DISTINCT YM AS CODE_NO , YM AS CODE_CD , YM AS CODE_NAME FROM IC_DTB ORDER BY YM DESC --?

select distinct CODE_NAME as CODE_NO , CODE_NAME as CODE_CD, CODE_NAME as CODE_NAME from ( SELECT CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE B WHERE LEVEL >1 START WITH CODE = 'AUTH_TYPE' CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE_NO =HIGHCODE
union all
select auth as CODE_NAME from COM_AUTH1 ) where 1=? ORDER BY UPPER(CODE_NAME)

SELECT DISTINCT
CONTRACT AS CODE_NO, CONTRACT AS CODE_CD, CONTRACT AS CODE_NAME FROM ORG_FA --?

SELECT DISTINCT
CONTRACT_TITLE AS CODE_NO, CONTRACT_TITLE AS CODE_CD, CONTRACT_TITLE AS CODE_NAME FROM ORG_FA_MAINTENANCE --?
SELECT CD_SYSDEF AS CODE_NO, CD_SYSDEF AS CODE_CD, NM_SYSDEF AS CODE_NAME FROM NEOE.MA_CODEDTL WHERE CD_FIELD = 'FI_T000011' AND CD_COMPANY = 'HIST' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND (CD_FLAG1=? OR CD_FLAG2=?)

SELECT EMPID AS CODE_NO, TO_EMPGRADECD(EMPID)||EMPID AS CODE_CD, TO_EMPKNAME(EMPID) AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT REQUESTER AS EMPID FROM CSR WHERE REQDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,6)||'01','YYYYMMDD') AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,6)||'01','YYYYMMDD'),1)) ORDER BY 3
SELECT DOC_NO AS CODE_NO, DOC_NO AS CODE_CD, ITEMNAME CODE_NAME FROM COM_DOCU WHERE ITEMDIV ='M' order by DOC_NO DESC
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR AS CODE_NO, YEAR AS CODE_CD, YEAR AS CODE_NAME FROM BIZAMOUNT A
SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(VER,1,4) AS CODE_NO, SUBSTR(VER,1,4) AS CODE_CD, SUBSTR(VER,1,4) AS CODE_NAME FROM SJ_REVISION A ORDER BY 1 DESC
begin LOG_EPM([EMPID],[IP]); end;

SELECT DISTINCT ITEM1 AS CODE_NO, ITEM1 AS CODE_CD, SUBSTR(ITEM1,1,20)||'('||COUNT(ITEM1) OVER(PARTITION BY ITEM1)||')' CODE_NAME FROM COM_DOCU WHERE 1=1 AND ITEMDIV='D' AND HIGHDOC_NO= ? order by ITEM1

SELECT DISTINCT ITEM2 AS CODE_NO, ITEM2 AS CODE_CD, SUBSTR(ITEM2,1,20)||'('||COUNT(ITEM2) OVER(PARTITION BY ITEM2)||')' CODE_NAME FROM COM_DOCU WHERE 1=1 AND ITEMDIV='D' AND HIGHDOC_NO= ? order by ITEM2

SELECT DISTINCT ITEM3 AS CODE_NO, ITEM3 AS CODE_CD, SUBSTR(ITEM3,1,20)||'('||COUNT(ITEM3) OVER(PARTITION BY ITEM3)||')' CODE_NAME FROM COM_DOCU WHERE 1=1 AND ITEMDIV='D' AND HIGHDOC_NO= ? order by ITEM3

SELECT DISTINCT ITEM4 AS CODE_NO, ITEM4 AS CODE_CD, SUBSTR(ITEM4,1,20)||'('||COUNT(ITEM4) OVER(PARTITION BY ITEM4)||')' CODE_NAME FROM COM_DOCU WHERE 1=1 AND ITEMDIV='D' AND HIGHDOC_NO= ? order by ITEM4

SELECT DISTINCT ITEM5 AS CODE_NO, ITEM5 AS CODE_CD, SUBSTR(ITEM5,1,20)||'('||COUNT(ITEM5) OVER(PARTITION BY ITEM5)||')' CODE_NAME FROM COM_DOCU WHERE 1=1 AND ITEMDIV='D' AND HIGHDOC_NO= ? order by ITEM5
SELECT SCH_NO AS CODE_NO, SCH_NO AS CODE_CD, TITLE AS CODE_NAME FROM SCH_MNG WHERE SCH_GB LIKE 'T' ORDER BY SCH_NO DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ORGCD AS CODE_NO, ORGCD AS CODE_CD, ORGNM AS CODE_NAME FROM ORG_HR WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN STA_YMD AND END_YMD AND LEVEL =2 AND ORG_CLASS NOT IN ('004') START WITH ORGCD = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR ORGCD =HIGHORGCD

SELECT EMP_ID AS CODE_NO, EMP_ID AS CODE_CD, EMP_NM AS CODE_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NM FROM HISTHR.PA1020_V_1 WHERE ORG_ID IN (SELECT ORGCD FROM ORG_HR WHERE REPLACE(?,'-','') BETWEEN STA_YMD AND END_YMD AND ORG_CLASS NOT IN ('004') START WITH ORGCD = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR ORGCD =HIGHORGCD) AND EMP_ID IN (SELECT REEMPID FROM DAILYREPORT WHERE REPORTDT LIKE SUBSTR(REPLACE(?,'-',''),1,6)||'%') ORDER BY EMP_NM

SELECT DISTINCT '50'||SUBSTR(CD_ACCT,3,8) AS CODE_NO, '50'||SUBSTR(CD_ACCT,3,8) AS CODE_CD, TO_ACCTNM(CD_ACCT) AS CODE_NAME FROM NEOE.FI_ADOCU WHERE NO_DOCU LIKE 'I'||REPLACE(?,'-','')||'%' AND CD_ACCT LIKE '5%' ORDER BY CODE_NO

SELECT REEMPID AS CODE_NO , REEMPID AS CODE_CD , REEMPKNAME AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT REEMPID , TO_EMPKNAME(REEMPID) REEMPKNAME FROM DAILYREPORT WHERE REPORTDT BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','')AND REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REEMPID IN (SELECT EMPID FROM EMPALL WHERE WENDDT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-31,'YYYYMMDD')) AND APEMPID IN (SELECT EMPID FROM EMPALL WHERE EMPID LIKE ? AND WENDDT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-31,'YYYYMMDD')) ) GROUP BY REEMPID, REEMPKNAME UNION ALL SELECT REEMPID AS CODE_NO , REEMPID AS CODE_CD , REEMPKNAME||'(합의)' AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT REEMPID , TO_EMPKNAME(REEMPID) REEMPKNAME FROM RPTMHCONTROL WHERE OBJEMPID IN (SELECT B.EMPID FROM EMPALL A, EMPALL B WHERE A.EMPID = ? AND A.SYSEMPID =B.SYSEMPID) AND REPORTDT BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') GROUP BY REEMPID,TO_EMPKNAME(REEMPID) )

SELECT REQUESTER AS CODE_NO, REQUESTER AS CODE_CD, TO_EMPKNAME(REQUESTER)||'('||COUNT(*) ||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM CSR WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') AND STS LIKE ?||'%' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM DUAL WHERE USER_GROUP=TO_USER_GP(?)) GROUP BY REQUESTER ORDER BY TO_EMPKNAME(REQUESTER)

SELECT TO_LAST_EMPID(CODE_NO) AS CODE_NO, TO_LAST_EMPID(CODE_CD) AS CODE_CD, TO_EMPKNAME(TO_LAST_EMPID(CODE_CD))||'('||SUM(CNT)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT PERSONIC AS CODE_NO, PERSONIC AS CODE_CD, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CSR WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') --? AND STS LIKE ''||'%' AND USER_GROUP IN (SELECT TO_USER_GP(?) FROM DUAL) GROUP BY PERSONIC ) GROUP BY TO_LAST_EMPID(CODE_NO)

SELECT STS AS CODE_NO, STS AS CODE_CD, GET_CODENAME('CSR_STS',STS)||'('||COUNT(STS)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM CSR WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') AND USER_GROUP IN (SELECT TO_USER_GP(?) FROM DUAL) GROUP BY STS

SELECT TEAM AS CODE_NO, TEAM AS CODE_CD, TO_CDNM(TEAM,'CSR_TEAM')||'('||COUNT(TEAM)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM CSR WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') AND STS LIKE ?||'%' AND USER_GROUP IN (SELECT TO_USER_GP(?) FROM DUAL) GROUP BY TEAM ORDER BY 3

SELECT CSR_TYPE AS CODE_NO, CSR_TYPE AS CODE_CD, GET_CODENAME('CSR_TYPE',CSR_TYPE)||'('||COUNT(CSR_TYPE)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM CSR WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') AND STS LIKE ?||'%' AND USER_GROUP IN (SELECT TO_USER_GP(?) FROM DUAL) GROUP BY CSR_TYPE ORDER BY 3
SELECT DECODE(LEV,2,SUBSTR(CODENO,1,4),CODENO) AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM ACCTCD_VIEW A WHERE A.CODE LIKE '5%' --AND SELFLAG = 'N' --and rownum < 5 and lev <= 2
SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE = 'FOOD_NAME' AND B.CODE IN ('H1','H8') ORDER BY B.IDX,CODE_CD
begin LOG_SLIP_VIEW([EMPID],[IP],[SEARCH]); end;
SELECT DOCNO AS CODE_NO, SUBSTR(DOCNO,4,8) AS CODE_CD, TITLE AS CODE_NAME FROM ISSUE A WHERE HIGHDOCNO='ROOT' --AND DOCNO IN () ? ORDER BY IDX,DOCNO
SELECT DISTINCT ACCTCD AS CODE_NO, ACCTCD AS CODE_CD, TO_ACCTNM(ACCTCD) AS CODE_NAME FROM SLIP WHERE YYYY||MM LIKE REPLACE(?,'-','') ORDER BY CODE_NO

SELECT ORGCD AS CODE_NO, ORGCD AS CODE_CD, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1))||'-'||ORGNM AS CODE_NAME FROM( SELECT * FROM ORG_HR WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN STA_YMD AND END_YMD AND ORG_CLASS NOT IN ('004')) START WITH ORGCD ='00000' --? CONNECT BY PRIOR ORGCD =HIGHORGCD

SELECT B.CODE AS CODE_NO, B.CODE AS CODE_CD, B.CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE = TO_USER_GP(?) AND A.HIGHCODE ='CD_SEQ-20081009-024' ORDER BY B.IDX,CODE_CD
SELECT EDU_NO AS CODE_NO , EDU_NO AS CODE_CD , EDU_TITLE AS CODE_NAME FROM QEDU_COURSE ORDER BY EDU_NO
SELECT QNOTE_TYPE AS CODE_NO , QNOTE_TYPE AS CODE_CD , QNOTE_NAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COURSE_QTYPE WHERE EDU_NO = ? ORDER BY QNOTE_TYPE

SELECT REQUESTER AS CODE_NO, REQUESTER AS CODE_CD, TO_EMPKNAME(REQUESTER)||'('||COUNT(*) ||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM CSR WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') AND STS LIKE ?||'%' AND USER_GROUP = TO_USER_GP(?) GROUP BY REQUESTER ORDER BY 3,TO_EMPKNAME(REQUESTER)

SELECT MAIN_SUBJ AS CODE_NO, MAIN_SUBJ AS CODE_CD, GET_CODENAME('CSR_SUBJ',MAIN_SUBJ)||'('||COUNT(MAIN_SUBJ)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM CSR A ,COMCODE B WHERE REGDATE BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') AND STS LIKE ?||'%' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM DUAL WHERE USER_GROUP=TO_USER_GP(?)) AND MAIN_SUBJ IS NOT NULL AND MAIN_SUBJ =CODE GROUP BY MAIN_SUBJ,IDX ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(IDX)

SELECT CODE AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,2,' - ' ,3,' - ' ,4,' - ' ,5,' - ' ,6,' - ' ,7,' - ' ,8,' - ' ,9,' - ' ,10,' - ' )||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A START WITH A.HIGHCODE IN (SELECT CODE_NO FROM COMCODE WHERE CODE = ? AND HIGHCODE = 'CD-20140228-001') CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CODE_NO=A.HIGHCODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY IDX,CODE_CD
SELECT MAILCODE AS CODE_NO , MAILCODE AS CODE_CD , MAILCODE||' : '||TITLE AS CODE_NAME FROM MAILMGM ORDER BY MAILCODE

SELECT SDATE CODE_NO , SDATE CODE_CD , SUBSTR(SDATE,0,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(SDATE,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(SDATE,7,2) CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NO, (A.YYYY||B.MM||C.DD) SDATE, (SELECT C_DESCRPTION FROM HISTHR.CALENDAR WHERE C_DATE = (A.YYYY||B.MM||C.DD)) C_DESCRPTION, DECODE((SELECT C_DESCRPTION FROM HISTHR.CALENDAR WHERE C_DATE = (A.YYYY||B.MM||C.DD)),'',1,'') FLAG, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY DECODE((SELECT C_DESCRPTION FROM HISTHR.CALENDAR WHERE C_DATE = (A.YYYY||B.MM||C.DD)),'',1,'') ORDER BY (A.YYYY||B.MM||C.DD)) ORD FROM (SELECT 2014+ROWNUM YYYY FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM < 8) A, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0')MM FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 12) B, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0')DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 31) C WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY( TO_DATE(LEAST(A.YYYY||B.MM||C.DD,TO_CHAR( LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(A.YYYY||B.MM,'YYYYMM')),'YYYYMMDD')), 'YYYYMMDD')),'DD')>= C.DD AND (A.YYYY||B.MM||C.DD) BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD')-3,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDD')+7,'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY YYYY,MM,DD)

SELECT DISTINCT DECODE(CT,'PC','P','데이터','D','네트워','N','한웨이','H','업무용','U','S') CODE_NO , DECODE(CT,'PC','P','데이터','D','네트워','N','한웨이','H','업무용','U','S') CODE_CD , DECODE(CT,'PC','PC유지보수','데이터','데이터센터','네트워','네트워크서비스','한웨이','한웨이','업무용','응용시스템','헬프데스크') CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT A.QNOTE_NO , B.CODENAME , SUBSTR(B.ED_DT,0,4) YY , A.QNO , C.QTYPE , C.QUESTION , D.CT , DECODE((SELECT CODE FROM COMCODE WHERE HIGHCODE IN (SELECT CODE_NO FROM COMCODE WHERE CODE IN C.QTYPE) AND CODE_NO = A.QNO_RE),'1','5','2','4','3','3','4','2','5','1','6','6') RE , E.QM_BIZ FROM QREPLY A , (SELECT A.CODE , A.CODENAME , B.ED_DT FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE_DETAIL B WHERE A.HIGHCODE = 'CD-20110426-001' AND A.CODE_NO = B.CODE_NO AND B.ED_DT IS NOT NULL ) B , QU C , (SELECT QNO , QTYPE , CT , PATH FROM (SELECT LEVEL AS LEV,A.*, DECODE(DECODE(SIGN(LENGTH(QTYPE)-1 ),1,'D',''),'D', SUBSTR(Sys_connect_by_path(QUESTION,'§'),9,3)) AS CT, Sys_connect_by_path(QUESTION,'>>') AS PATH FROM QU A WHERE LEVEL>1 START WITH HIGHQNO IN('QM') CONNECT BY PRIOR QNO=HIGHQNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY SEQ)) D , QMEMBER E WHERE A.QNOTE_NO = B.CODE AND A.QNO = C.QNO AND A.QNO = D.QNO AND A.QM_NO = E.QM_NO ) A WHERE A.RE IS NOT NULL AND A.YY BETWEEN ?-1 AND ? AND A.QM_BIZ = ?

SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(B.ED_DT,0,4) CODE_NO , SUBSTR(B.ED_DT,0,4) CODE_CD , SUBSTR(B.ED_DT,0,4) CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE_DETAIL B WHERE A.HIGHCODE = 'CD-20110426-001' AND A.CODE_NO = B.CODE_NO AND B.ED_DT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SUBSTR(B.ED_DT,0,4) DESC

SELECT DISTINCT EMPID AS CODE_NO, EMPID AS CODE_CD, TO_EMPKNAME(EMPID)||' '|| TO_EMPGRADENAME(EMPID)||'('|| count(*) over(partition by EMPID)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM TASK_MNG WHERE MSG_GB ='T' ORDER BY 3

SELECT DISTINCT ORGCD AS CODE_NO, ORGCD AS CODE_CD, TO_ORGNM(TO_ORGCD(ORGCD))|| '('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY ORGCD) ||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM TASK_MNG WHERE EMPID LIKE ''||'%' AND STATUS LIKE ''||'%' AND MSG_GB = 'T' AND NVL(GET_ORGDIV(TO_EMPORGNO(EMPID),'T'),GET_ORGDIV(TO_EMPORGNO(EMPID),'G')) LIKE ''||'%' ORDER BY 3
SELECT B.CODENAME AS CODE_NO, B.CODENAME AS CODE_CD, B.CDDS AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A, COMCODE B WHERE A.CODE_NO=B.HIGHCODE AND A.CODE = ? ORDER BY B.IDX,CODE_CD

SELECT DISTINCT CORP_CD AS CODE_NO ,CORP_CD AS CODE ,TO_CDNM(CORP_CD,'CORP_CD')||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY CORP_CD)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM ASR_MNG WHERE CORP_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND SITE_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND SL LIKE ?||'%' AND S_GB LIKE ?||'%'

SELECT DISTINCT SITE_CD AS CODE_NO ,SITE_CD AS CODE , TO_CDNM(SITE_CD,'SITE_CD')||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SITE_CD)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM ASR_MNG WHERE CORP_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND SITE_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND SL LIKE ?||'%' AND S_GB LIKE ?||'%'

SELECT DISTINCT SL AS CODE_NO ,SL AS CODE ,TO_CDNM(SL,'ASR_SL')||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SL)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM ASR_MNG WHERE CORP_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND SITE_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND SL LIKE ?||'%' AND S_GB LIKE ?||'%' AND S_GB != '*'

SELECT DISTINCT S_GB AS CODE_NO ,S_GB AS CODE , TO_CDNM(S_GB,'ASR_CD') AS CODE_NAME FROM ASR_MNG WHERE CORP_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND SITE_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND SL LIKE ?||'%' AND S_GB LIKE ?||'%' AND S_GB != '*'

SELECT CODE AS CODE_NO, CODE AS CODE_CD, DECODE(LEVEL,2,' - ' ,3,' - ' ,4,' - ' ,5,' - ' ,6,' - ' ,7,' - ' ,8,' - ' ,9,' - ' ,10,' - ' )||CODENAME AS CODE_NAME FROM COMCODE A WHERE LEVEL<5 START WITH A.HIGHCODE IN ('CD-20160311-040')--? CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CODE_NO=A.HIGHCODE

SELECT SR_SYSTEM_CD AS CODE_NO, SR_SYSTEM_CD AS CODE_CD, SR_SYSTEM_NM AS CODE_NAME -- SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD, -- STARTDT, -- ENDDT, -- CR_DT, -- CR_EMPID, -- MOD_DT, -- MOD_EMPID FROM SR_SYSTEM WHERE LEVEL=1 --? START WITH SR_SYSTEM_CD IN ( '' -- 'H' -- ,'I' -- ,'K' -- ,'D' -- ,'M' ,'C' -- ,'J' -- ,'T' -- ,'X' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR SR_SYSTEM_CD=SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD

SELECT SR_SYSTEM_CD AS CODE_NO, SR_SYSTEM_CD AS CODE_CD, SR_SYSTEM_NM AS CODE_NAME -- SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD, -- STARTDT, -- ENDDT, -- CR_DT, -- CR_EMPID, -- MOD_DT, -- MOD_EMPID FROM SR_SYSTEM WHERE SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD =? START WITH SR_SYSTEM_CD IN ( '' -- 'H' -- ,'I' -- ,'K' -- ,'D' -- ,'M' ,'C' -- ,'J' -- ,'T' -- ,'X' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR SR_SYSTEM_CD=SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD

SELECT SR_SYSTEM_CD AS CODE_NO, SR_SYSTEM_CD AS CODE_CD, SR_SYSTEM_NM AS CODE_NAME -- SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD, -- STARTDT, -- ENDDT, -- CR_DT, -- CR_EMPID, -- MOD_DT, -- MOD_EMPID FROM SR_SYSTEM WHERE SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD =? START WITH SR_SYSTEM_CD IN ( '' -- 'H' -- ,'I' -- ,'K' -- ,'D' -- ,'M' ,'C' -- ,'J' -- ,'T' -- ,'X' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR SR_SYSTEM_CD=SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD

SELECT SR_SYSTEM_CD AS CODE_NO, SR_SYSTEM_CD AS CODE_CD, SR_SYSTEM_NM AS CODE_NAME -- SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD, -- STARTDT, -- ENDDT, -- CR_DT, -- CR_EMPID, -- MOD_DT, -- MOD_EMPID FROM SR_SYSTEM WHERE SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD =? START WITH SR_SYSTEM_CD IN ( '' -- 'H' -- ,'I' -- ,'K' -- ,'D' -- ,'M' ,'C' -- ,'J' -- ,'T' -- ,'X' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR SR_SYSTEM_CD=SR_HIGH_SYSTEM_CD

SELECT SYSTEMCD AS CODE_NO, SYSTEMCD AS CODE_CD, SYSTEMNM||'('||COUNT(DISTINCT SYSTEMCD)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM SR_DOC A, SR_CONFER B,SR_CONFER C,SR_SYSTEM D WHERE 1=1 AND A.SR_NO=B.SR_NO(+) AND A.SR_NO=C.SR_NO(+) AND A.SR_SYSTEM=D.SYSTEMCD(+) AND SR_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','') AND SYSTEMCD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY SYSTEMCD,SYSTEMNM

SELECT DISTINCT CONF_TYPE AS CODE_NO ,CONF_TYPE AS CODE_CD ,TO_CDNM(CONF_TYPE,'SR_STATUS')||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY CONF_TYPE)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM (select SR_NO, DOC_TYPE, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY SR_NO ORDER BY CONF_DT DESC) AS DOC_RANK, CONF_TYPE AS CONF_TYPE, CONF_EMPID, STATUS, CONF_DT, CONF_COMMENT, CONF_SN From SR_CONFER WHERE SR_NO IN (SELECT SR_NO FROM SR_DOC WHERE SR_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','')) ) WHERE DOC_RANK=1 ORDER BY CONF_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT SR_EMPID AS CODE_NO ,SR_EMPID AS CODE_CD ,NVL(TO_EMPKNAME(SR_EMPID),SR_EMPID)||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SR_EMPID)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM SR_DOC WHERE SR_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','')

SELECT DISTINCT CONF_EMPID AS CODE_NO ,CONF_EMPID AS CODE_CD ,NVL(TO_EMPKNAME(CONF_EMPID),CONF_EMPID)||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY CONF_EMPID)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT SR_NO, DOC_TYPE, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY SR_NO ORDER BY CONF_DT DESC) AS DOC_RANK, CONF_TYPE AS CONF_TYPE, CONF_EMPID, STATUS, CONF_DT, CONF_COMMENT, CONF_SN FROM SR_CONFER WHERE SR_NO IN (SELECT SR_NO FROM SR_DOC WHERE SR_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','')) ) WHERE DOC_RANK=1 ORDER BY CONF_EMPID

SELECT DISTINCT DOC_TYPE AS CODE_NO ,DOC_TYPE AS CODE_CD ,TO_CDNM(DOC_TYPE,'SR_DOC_GB')||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY DOC_TYPE)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM (select SR_NO, DOC_TYPE, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY SR_NO ORDER BY CONF_DT DESC) AS DOC_RANK, CONF_TYPE AS CONF_TYPE, CONF_EMPID, STATUS, CONF_DT, CONF_COMMENT, CONF_SN From SR_CONFER WHERE SR_NO IN (SELECT SR_NO FROM SR_DOC WHERE SR_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','')) ) WHERE DOC_RANK=1 ORDER BY DOC_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT SR_TYPE AS CODE_NO ,SR_TYPE AS CODE_CD ,TO_CDNM(SR_TYPE,'SR_GB')||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SR_TYPE)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM SR_DOC WHERE SR_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(?,'-','') AND REPLACE(?,'-','')

SELECT DISTINCT CORPCD AS CODE_NO, CORPCD AS CODE_CD, TO_CDNM(CORPCD,'AT_CORP')||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY CORPCD)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM COM_USER A WHERE CORPCD LIKE ?||'%' OR 'T' = ? --관리자 전체조회 ORDER BY CORPCD
SELECT DISTINCT ORGCD AS CODE_NO, ORGCD AS CODE_CD, ORGCD||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY ORGCD)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM COM_USER A WHERE CORPCD LIKE ?||'%' OR 'T' = ? --관리자 전체조회 ORDER BY ORGCD
SELECT DISTINCT PARTCD AS CODE_NO, PARTCD AS CODE_CD, PARTCD||'('||COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY PARTCD)||')' AS CODE_NAME FROM COM_USER A WHERE CORPCD LIKE ?||'%' OR 'T' = ? --관리자 전체조회 ORDER BY PARTCD
SELECT DISTINCT SYSTEMID AS CODE_NO, USERID AS CODE_CD, USERNM AS CODE_NAME FROM COM_USER A WHERE CORPCD LIKE ?||'%' or 'T' = ? --관리자 전체조회 ORDER BY USERNM
